info.title: Thesis Tracker
info.description: API for managing university thesis submissions and reviews

post.description: OAuth2 compatible token login, get an access token for future requests.

schema.title: Response Login Api V1 Auth Login Post

get.description: Get a specific user by id.
Get all users with optional role filtering.

schema.title: Response Read Users Api V1 Users  Get

get.description: Retrieve theses based on user role. Can be filtered by supervisor_id (for admins/assistants).

schema.title: Response Read Theses Api V1 Theses  Get

get.description: Get a specific thesis by ID.
Retrieve comments for a specific thesis.

schema.title: Response Read Thesis Comments Api V1 Theses  Thesis Id  Comments Get

post.description: Create a new comment on a thesis.

get.description: Retrieve committee members for a specific thesis.

schema.title: Response Read Thesis Committee Api V1 Theses  Thesis Id  Committee Get

post.description: Add a committee member to a thesis.

delete.description: Remove a committee member from a thesis.

get.description: Retrieve all attachments for a thesis.

schema.title: Response Read Attachments Api V1 Theses  Thesis Id  Attachments Get

post.description: Create new attachment for a thesis.

get.description: Get a specific attachment by ID.

put.description: Update an attachment metadata (not the file itself).

get.description:
Download a specific attachment.
If inline=true, it will attempt to display in the browser instead of downloading.

schema.title: Response Download Attachment Api V1 Theses  Thesis Id  Attachments  Attachment Id  Download Get

get.description:
Preview a specific attachment with converted content for display in the browser.
Returns different formats based on the 'format' parameter:
- json: Full preview data including HTML and text content (default)
- html: HTML-only response for direct embedding
- text: Plain text content for simple display

schema.title: Response Preview Attachment Api V1 Theses  Thesis Id  Attachments  Attachment Id  Preview Get

post.description: Replace an existing attachment with a new file.

get.description: Retrieve events for the current user.

schema.title: Response Read Events Api V1 Events  Get

get.description: Get a specific event by ID.
Retrieve requests (sent by students or received by assistants)

schema.title: Response List Requests Api V1 Assistant Requests  Get

put.description: Update a request status (accept or decline)

get.description: Get details for a specific request

delete.description: Cancel a pending assistant request (student only)

post.description:
Create a new review for a specific thesis.

Only accessible by graduation assistants.
The review title is auto-generated.

get.description: Welcome to the Thesis Tracker API.
